content: Hey,Now you can own two crypto artefacts proving event that made history. Nicely placed in black frames and ready to hang them out on the wall above your bed. Don’t ask your wife for permission, she wouldn’t agree. Should I start an auction?- 1x Original newspapers Diario El Salvador from June 9th, 2021 (impossible to find  )- 1x Original newspapers Diario El Salvador from September 7th, 2021 (hard to find)- 2x Black frame with papers inside- Worldwide FREE shipping with Priority FedEx (shipping from Czechia) - Only escrow (I prefer Escaroo project), seller (me) pays escrow fee and shippinghttps://ibb.co/tCFznt8https://ibb.co/kyMWd2Vd.
